column5: ok so i dont know where they come up with this stuff but arent kids awesome!!!!  this is my little guy warming up for spring fishing with dad!  http://ca.youtube.com/watch?v=RLmHzOaV0aM&...re=channel_page  cheers!
Cute little fella. Yep, he's ready for fishing now.
Looks like you got yourself a partner for next soft water season  Thanks for sharing Leechman
That is a classic. Thanks for sharing it. Jim
When he's done with his gubby you could attach a hook and troll with it.
Yup,  he's ready!  Now watch your tackle box supplies diminish......................
thanks all, its funny how the last couple years he is the reason i havent been fishing much however the next 15-20 will be the main reason i will be!!!  Cheers!

that's cute man..wait until he gets a little older...my little one now 5..asks when we can go to the trailer all the time...and yes you have to watch out or you will soon find a chunk of your tackle is some how missing when you go to use it..my 3 daughter's are brutal for that  perfect age this coming summer to start getting the little guy into some panfish for a thrill

Awesome!  That was me 17 years ago, and look at me now!  Buried in tackle (much of it adopted from dad) and broke as ever!  I see lots of good times on the water with your little guy, fishin with dad as a youngster make up most of my favourite memories and I still get out with him as much as possible.
